page.title: 17Legend of the White Lady.
page.content: A long time ago, a young girl,from Daddlington,used to play and sing around a well,which was in front of an old cottage. This angered the old lady who lived in the cottage. One day she told the girl to drop a stone down the well and count how long it took to reach the bottom. When the girl did this,the old lady pushed her down the well. When the old lady died she was buried in white clothing,and her white horse was also killed and buried with her. The children of Dadlington are still told this story. It is said that she haunts this area and has been called the White Lady of Dadlington.
